points.title: Oracle EBS zero-day exploit targeting Oracle EBS users
points.summary: A zero-day vulnerability in Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) is being exploited, targeting major organizations. The threat actor group FIN11 is linked to this campaign, which involves data theft and an extortion spree.
relevance_reasons: No impacted assets found in the customer profile. Setting relevance to the organization-specific adjustments.
Low risk appetite: +0.10 relevance score.

points.title: Landfall Android Spyware Targeted Samsung Phones via Zero-Day
points.summary: Threat actors exploited CVE-2025-21042 to deliver malware via specially crafted images to users in the Middle East, targeting Samsung phones with Landfall Android Spyware.

points.title: Agenda Ransomware Deploys Linux Variant
points.summary: Agenda ransomware has deployed a Linux variant targeting Windows systems through remote management tools and BYOVD techniques. The M365 product (corporate email and collaboration) is the only impacted asset due to use of remote management tools.
relevance_reasons: M365 email system is potentially exposed to initial access via remote management tools.
M365 has high data sensitivity.

points.title: Risky Bulletin: Yaniluowang ransomware IAB pleads guilty
points.summary: The Yaniluowang ransomware incident reported by Risky Business. No specific Airtel assets are directly targeted, indicating a general threat.
relevance_reasons: General ransomware threat with potential impact on various systems.

points.threat_name: Malicious NuGet Packages with Delayed Logic Bombs
points.title: Hidden Logic Bombs in Malware-Laced NuGet Packages Set to Detonate Years After Installation
points.summary: Malicious NuGet packages with delayed logic bombs target Siemens S7 PLCs and database systems, potentially causing sabotage and disruption in manufacturing and other industries.
relevance_reasons: Impacts 4G/5G Core Network Platform (mission_critical, crown jewel, high data sensitivity).
Impacts Tower & Power Monitoring SCADA (high business criticality).

points.summary: Exploitation of CVE-2025-59287 in Windows Server Update Service is under investigation. The vulnerability allows for data exfiltration from compromised hosts. Immediate patching is recommended.
relevance_reasons: The organization uses Microsoft 365 which is affected by the exploited vulnerability.

points.title: Redis Critical Remote Code Execution Vulnerability Discovered after 13 Years
points.summary: Critical remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2025-49844) in Redis, allowing authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on older versions with Lua scripting enabled. Patch immediately.
relevance_reasons: Impacts Enterprise Data Lake & Analytics Platform (high data sensitivity)
Impacts Nxtra Data Center & Colocation Platform (crown jewel)

points.title: Cyber Threat Snapshot

points.title: Microsoft Uncovers 'Whisper Leakâ€™ Attack That Identifies AI Chat Topics in Encrypted Traffic
points.summary: Microsoft disclosed a novel side-channel attack called 'Whisper Leak' targeting remote language models. This attack allows a passive adversary to observe network traffic and identify AI chat topics in encrypted communications. The attack highlights vulnerabilities in AI chat systems and encrypted traffic analysis, raising concerns about privacy and security in AI communications.

points.title: Ernst & Young (EY) Data Breach Due to Cloud Misconfiguration
points.summary: A cloud misconfiguration led to a data breach at Ernst & Young (EY), exposing sensitive data on Microsoft Azure. The exposure included a full SQL Server database backup file. The incident highlights the need for robust access controls and continuous monitoring in cloud environments.
relevance_reasons: Cloud misconfiguration can expose sensitive data.
Impacts cloud-hosted data and infrastructure.
Risk appetite is low.
